buginformation.summary: fast math cosh sinh not support the same range values the math counterparts
buginformation.description: reported jeff hain cosh double and sinh double math cosh 709 783 991046692770538e 307 fastmath cosh 709 783 infinity math sinh 709 783 991046692770538e 307 fastmath sinh 709 783 infinity this due using exp for values above the result sometimes should not overflow but exp does end with some infinity for values strictmath log double max value exp will overflow you need use that instead for positive double exp return for negative double exp return
